item.description:
Host: Claire P. cell @ 603-247-0897
RAIN CANCELS THIS EVENT!

Weather permitting, I think it would be fun to go hiking or snow shoeing on the Musquash Conservation Land trails in Hudson NH. Please know that my intent is to enjoy the view of the area, and to chat along the way.  This event is meant more to have fun than to get a workout.  I plan on hiking for approximately two hours, while taking many small breaks along the way. 

We will meet at 1:00pm sharp, at the Musquash Rd, entrance. Please follow these directions: From the Hudson area, take Dracut Rd to Musquash Rd, drive about 0.5 mi, take left on Gowing, and immediate right on Musquash. Drive approximately 0.5 mi, the entrance will be on your right.  Look for a white Toyota or a Meetup sign. 

Please remember to bring plenty of fluids and to dress in layers for comfort.

This event is at no cost! I hope to see you there!

Please RSVP or call my cell @ 603-247-0897   Do not RSVP no.

 

Location: Musquash Conservation Land, Hudson NH
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a white Toyota Corolla
item.name: Hiking in Hudson NH
